short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlock multiplayer browsing. Explore a digital universe composed of shared online spaces.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With The Local Universe, every website transforms into a unique planet filled with activities and multiplayer features. This is the only overlay you will need while browsing the internet.

What is the localuniverse?

ğŸª Hang Out And Play Easily: Jump into games and hang out with friends effortlessly in a space designed for seamless interaction and enjoyment.

ğŸš€ There Is No Place Like Home: Design and decorate your own cozy corner of the internet where you can express yourself, unwind, and connect with friends in a setting that's truly your own.

ğŸŒŒ Explore The Infinite: Embark on a journey through the digital cosmos, where every unique URL is a world of its own, waiting to be explored. Uncover the diversity and richness of the internet's landscapes, one click at a time.

ğŸ® How do you move?
- Your primary movement keys are W, A, S, D, and Space.

ğŸ’ How do you open your inventory?
- You open your inventory with I.

ğŸ  How do you fish?
1. You start fishing by clicking your interact button E near a body of water.
2. When notified of a bite, press E to hook the fish and start the minigame.
3. If you do not press E in time, the fish will get away.
4. During the minigame, hold E to move the bar up and down.
- Release E while the bar is within the green section to catch the fish.
- If the bar is outside the green section when released, the fish will get away.

ğŸª¨ How do you collect samples?
1. On planets without water, nodes will spawn (rocks, plants, meteors, etc.).
2. Press E while standing on a node to begin collecting samples.
3. A Scanner UI will appear with a line moving back and forth.
4. Press E when the line crosses over a located sample (white circles).
5. You have three attempts to successfully land on samples.

ğŸ•¹ How do you play parkour?
1. When on a planet, press R to teleport to the randomly generated parkour course. If you fall off, just reset by pressing R again.
2. Leave to the right of the starting platform to begin your lap.

ğŸ How do you get LUX to buy items?
1. Open your inventory by pressing I.
2. At the bottom of your inventory click on the Map.
3. From here press on Warp to The Nexus.
4. Run up to the Recycler and press E to begin selling the items you have collected.
5. Drag and drop the items you would like to recycle into the 6 empty slots on the left and then click Recycle.
